full_summary:
- **Title**: Polar Over The Horizon Radar (POTHR) - Request for Proposal
- **Reference Number**: PW-__QF-125-29258
- **Solicitation Number**: W7714-228152/B
- **Publication Date**: January 8, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date and Time**: May 21, 2024, 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time
- **Amendment Date**: May 17, 2024
- **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
- **Solicitation Status**: Expiré

### Tender Description

A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued for the design, build, installation, and operation of a second Canadian POTHR system in the Northwest Territories. The system will work in cooperation with the previously installed Nunavut POTHR system.

The Core component of the Contract is estimated to be from the date of Contract award until 24 months after Contract award. The Task Authorization component is for work required on an ad-hoc basis to support system operations. Technical Investigations and Engineering Services (TIES) will also be provided to support further deployment of the POTHR capability.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Key Requirements

* Design, build, and install a second POTHR system
* Operate the system cooperatively with the previously installed Nunavut POTHR system
* Provide Technical Investigations and Engineering Services (TIES) to support further deployment of the POTHR capability

### Trade Agreements

This RFP is subject to the following Trade Agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information

* [Name], Paul Lacoursiere
* Telephone: (343) 551-1529
* Email: [Paul.Lacoursiere@pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Paul.Lacoursiere@pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Address: 11 Laurier St., Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau QC K1A 0S5
* [Fax](Fax not provided)

### Tendering Procedure

All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The Competitive Procurement Strategy is Best Overall Proposal. The tender closing date is May 21, 2024. Suppliers should submit their bid according to the instructions provided in the solicitation document.
